Hey there,

for the career mode i wanted a SSTO that can make it everywhere in Kerbins SOI and back. I startet of with one of my favorite SSTOS the Aeris 5 from Danger2007. I just made it an Airhogger and redid the tanks, i tried to make i run with aerospikes but had not too much success.

It has KW Sturts and KSPX liquid fuel tank as an Drop Tank on it and mechjeb on it.

So i could make it stock in like 5mins.
